headline: Retirees Are Winning Big in 2026: 3 Popular Dividend Stocks Are Soaring

headline: Instead of replacing workers with AI, Walmart is dishing out training for over 1.6 million U.S. employees

headline: Is Verizon (VZ) Pricing Reflect Long Term Value After Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: If you are wondering whether Verizon Communications' current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you assess that. Verizon shares most recently closed at US$48.05, with a 1.9% decline over the last 7 days, set against stronger returns of 23.5% over 30 days, 18.6% year to date, 22.2% over 1 year, 49.9% over 3 years, and 14.2% over 5 years. Recent news coverage around Verizon has focused on the company as a large US telecom player,...

headline: 1 Unpopular Stock That Deserves a Second Chance and 2 That Underwhelm
